Row.Text: Unlocks Stories of All Great People

This mod unlocks all stories associated with all Civilization Unique Great People Units. In Civilization 7, there is a chance to trigger a story related to the Great Person after retiring. In general, 1 out of 10 Great People will be triggered at random. This mod has changed the probability of triggering to 100%, making it easier for players to experience all the stories associated with great people. However, it is also important to note that these stories will have some bonuses that will affect the gameplay of the game.
